metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for one of the crowd patrons in the crowd at Dribbles' show.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug Book > Act 3 > Wyrm's Crossing > Circus of the Last Days. Go through the circus and to the right - trigger the Dribbles fight (1,1,1,1 the scene). You can speak to this chatacter after.

0.speaker: Gloria
0.text: I thought you were part of the show at first... but that was real.
0.context: NodeContext: just survived a fight - angry and terrified. Lashing out.

1.speaker: Gloria
1.text: You should consider a career in law enforcement - or show business.
1.context: NodeContext: just survived a fight - angry and terrified. Lashing out.

2.speaker: Gloria
2.context: NodeContext: panicked, hiding at the edge of a combat
